About Us

SRB MUSICALS Combining recording studio services with music instruction, SRB Music Studio brings the full music experience to you. Immerse yourself in as much or as little of the professional musician experience as you like! We offer Guitar, Bass, Ukulele, Piano, Drum, and Voice lessons. We also coach songwriting and music production for intermediate and professional musicians. Whether you're just beginning, or looking for some advanced tips, let SRB Music Studio mentor you..
